subject: Inclusion of electrical utility shifting work in the BOQ of futre contracts as DPR stage of the Civil work.
text: 9Trf <efl4 <TTHT gfadrrot 34 /Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Wa 4aa7, Tev 4Rar7T 3r TnoTANf TAT4) 447 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 TT 7T IT HT National Highways Authority of India QTT Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 3-5 Qa 6, #qer-10, GRGT, 7$ factif-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No:: 11041/218/2007-Admn. 27.07.2009 POLICY MATTERS TECHNICAL (34/2009) (Decision taken on Technical Division's File No. NHAI/EW-IUtility shiftinglweekly meeting/08) Sub: Inclusion of electrical utility shifting work in the BOQ of future contracts as DPR stage of the Civil work: The matter on the above mentioned . subject was discussed in 44th Executive Committee meeting held on 11.06.2009 where in it was informed that utility shifting works in the states are being carried out by various boards on deposit basis which consumes more time from estimates preparation to execution of work of shifting: 2. Based on the discussions in the meeting it was decided that the shifting work shall be a part of the BOQ of future contracts as being done in BOT projects where utility shifting are being done in BOT projects where utility shifting are being done by concessionaires themselves 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: AXA (S.K. Nirmal) General Manager (Coord:) To: 1_ PS to Chairman 2. PS to All Members 3. PS to All CGMsICVO 4. AlI GMsDGMsIManagers 5. AII PIUs/CMUsISPVs 6. Librarian/Hindi Officer NHAL utility
